name: ONYX Graphics
overview: Onyx Graphics, Inc. designs, develops, and markets commercial printing software and solutions for the digital color printing marketplace worldwide. The company offers ProductionHouse, a solution for running a print factory that allows the client to control production workflow; PosterShop, a solution for professional printers; RIPCenter, a raster image processing solution that allows printing in various formats; PrepEdge Pro, a solution for large format production; and PrintMetryx that provides Web-based tools to predict, manage, and report print costs. It also provides product training materials and support services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.
